Key Match Events: Lillard hit the go-ahead jump shot with 9.8 seconds left to give the Bucks the lead
Donovan Mitchell sank the game-winning shot with 0.3 seconds remaining
Gary Trent Jr. poked the ball out of Mitchell's hands but couldn't get the steal
Post-Match Reflections: Lillard's 41-point effort was wasted as the Bucks suffered their fifth-straight defeat
The Bucks have no time to mope as they return to action on Monday in Cleveland
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lillard made five 3-point shots in the first quarter to guide the Bucks to an early lead
The Bucks were up 38-30 after one quarter but the Cavaliers came back to get the lead with three minutes left in the second period
Lillard saved the quarter for Milwaukee, scoring the last five points for the team to maintain a 62-61 advantage at halftime
